ai-mil7.7.2:1.1_0: “A large one-and-admitor as far as the forest. What would you go to?”
ai-mil7.7.2:1.2_0: “Great king, the thundering in the sky crying,
ai-mil7.7.2:1.3_0: In the same way, a wise disciple should first undertake and dwell in the fire hut when the negativity of seclusion, questioning, resorts, and servants.
ai-mil7.7.2:1.4_0: This is a destination, a one mustard seeds.
ai-mil7.7.2:1.5_0: When the Buddha has spoken, the gods of the Thirty-Three became fully extinguished,
ai-mil7.7.2:2.1_0: ‘Please, Ānanda, you must all strive and practice for your own goal! Meditate diligent, keen, and resolute for your own goal! Meditate diligent, keen, and resolute for your own goal!’”
ai-mil7.7.2:3.1_0: The second part of the rainy season.
